author: JamesWTruher
body:
new-psdrive -psprov filesystem -root /tmp -name FOO
get-childitem foo:/
get-childitem : Cannot find path '/tmp/foo:/' because it does not exist

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Yeah for some reason the code surrounding the splitting of drives names from paths was changed quite a bit to support single root filesystems that start with slash, but I'm sure it could be done in a much more compatible manner.
